document_data.name: Karrnsyrrl
document_data.mainbody: '''Karrnsyrrl''' was an [[dragon aging|ancient]] [[red dragon]] that wracked havoc across [[Daggerford]], the surrounding [[Sword Coast]], and even islands off the [[Sea of Swords]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: After being released unto the Realms, Karrnsyrrl enjoyed a partnership with the malevolent [[rakshasa]] named [[Nadir]].
document_data.History:
[[File:Lathanderian banner.jpg|thumb|right|250px|Karrnsyrrl, squaring off against [[adventurer]]s, including a follower of [[Amaunator]].]]
Prior to the [[slaadi]] invasion of [[Daggerford]] that broke out some time during or around the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, Karrnsyrrl was trapped within a long lost ''[[iron flask]]'' that was recently recovered by the rakshasa Nadir. While the exact circumstances of the events were unclear, it was known that Nadir used the ''[[Ambergul Blade]]'' to unstop the cork from the flask, and let loose Karrnsyrrl upon the Realms.

The ancient dragon erupted from [[Daggerford Castle]] in a raging inferno and ravaged the town. He snatched in his claws the nobleman [[Christos Tellos]], who had previously uncovered the ''iron flask'', and flew him away from the city. and as far to the southwest as [[Corwell]], on the isle of [[Gwynneth]] in the [[Moonshaes]]. While in there, Karrnsyrrl was turned away by a [[ki-rin]] named [[Daiwon]].

A group of adventurers tracked Karrnsyrrl along his path of destruction, and eventually made their way to the [[Sword Mountains]] on the [[Sword Coast North]]. After delving into the crypt of [[Uruth Ukrypt (individual)|Uruth Ukrypt]], the adventures became imminently aware that both Karrnsyrrl and Nadir were about to attack them.
